column2: "You really know how to work hard, looking for things seems to be your forte."
"But I didn't run after you just to tell you that."
"There's somewhere I'd really like you to go with me."
"The place to meet is here at the Dragon Sanctum. I'll tell you the details when me meet."
"Right now I need to get back to another mission. They really work me too hard lately."
"Anyways, sorry to bother you, but I really need your help."
